content: bind round 36 - knit all sts off for thumb it makes the thumb hole too large round 37 - k13 k1f&b slm k1 k11 slm k1f&b k3 k12 round 38 - knit all sts round 39 - k14 k1f&b slm k1 k11 slm k1f&b k4 k12 round 40 - knit all sts round 41 - k15 k1f&b slm k1 k11 slm k1f&b k5 k12 round 42 - knit all sts round 43 - k16 k1f&b slm k1 k11 slm kf&b k6 k12 round 44 - knit all sts yarn in photo tahki yarns new tweed ©2012 melissa woods www spicyhomemaker com
